access-config.help: Enable/disable FortiAnalyzer access to configuration and data.
access-config.name: access-config

options.help: Enable FortiAnalyzer access to configuration and data.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable FortiAnalyzer access to configuration and data.
options.name: disable

certificate.help: Certificate used to communicate with FortiAnalyzer.
certificate.name: certificate

certificate-verification.help: Enable/disable identity verification of FortiAnalyzer by use of certificate.
certificate-verification.name: certificate-verification

options.help: Enable identity verification of FortiAnalyzer by use of certificate.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable identity verification of FortiAnalyzer by use of certificate.
options.name: disable

conn-timeout.help: FortiAnalyzer connection time-out in seconds (for status and log buffer).
conn-timeout.name: conn-timeout

enc-algorithm.help: Configure the level of SSL protection for secure communication with FortiAnalyzer.
enc-algorithm.name: enc-algorithm

options.help: Encrypt logs using high and medium encryption algorithms.
options.name: high-medium

options.help: Encrypt logs using high encryption algorithms.
options.name: high

options.help: Encrypt logs using all encryption algorithms.
options.name: low

options.help: Use SHA256 as HMAC algorithm.
options.name: sha256

options.help: Step down to SHA1 as the HMAC algorithm.
options.name: sha1

options.help: Enable IPS packet archive logging.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable IPS packet archive logging.
options.name: disable

max-log-rate.help: FortiAnalyzer maximum log rate in MBps (0 = unlimited).
max-log-rate.name: max-log-rate

monitor-failure-retry-period.help: Time between FortiAnalyzer connection retries in seconds (for status and log buffer).
monitor-failure-retry-period.name: monitor-failure-retry-period

monitor-keepalive-period.help: Time between OFTP keepalives in seconds (for status and log buffer).
monitor-keepalive-period.name: monitor-keepalive-period

options.help: Set FortiAnalyzer log transmission priority to default.
options.name: default

options.help: Set FortiAnalyzer log transmission priority to low.
options.name: low

options.help: Enable reliable logging to FortiAnalyzer.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable reliable logging to FortiAnalyzer.
options.name: disable

source-ip.help: Source IPv4 or IPv6 address used to communicate with FortiAnalyzer.
source-ip.name: source-ip

ssl-min-proto-version.help: Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
ssl-min-proto-version.name: ssl-min-proto-version

options.help: Follow system global setting.
options.name: default

options.help: SSLv3.
options.name: SSLv3

options.help: TLSv1.
options.name: TLSv1

options.help: TLSv1.1.
options.name: TLSv1-1

options.help: TLSv1.2.
options.name: TLSv1-2

options.help: Enable logging to FortiAnalyzer.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable logging to FortiAnalyzer.
options.name: disable

upload-day.help: Day of week (month) to upload logs.
upload-day.name: upload-day

upload-interval.help: Frequency to upload log files to FortiAnalyzer.
upload-interval.name: upload-interval

options.help: Upload log files to FortiAnalyzer once a day.
options.name: daily

options.help: Upload log files to FortiAnalyzer once a week.
options.name: weekly

options.help: Upload log files to FortiAnalyzer once a month.
options.name: monthly

upload-option.help: Enable/disable logging to hard disk and then uploading to FortiAnalyzer.
upload-option.name: upload-option

options.help: Log to hard disk and then upload to FortiAnalyzer.
options.name: store-and-upload

options.help: Log directly to FortiAnalyzer in real time.
options.name: realtime

options.help: Log directly to FortiAnalyzer at most every 1 minute.
options.name: 1-minute

options.help: Log directly to FortiAnalyzer at most every 5 minutes.
options.name: 5-minute
